flossing is essential for clean healthy teeth .

output.sentences: During my recent business trip I stayed at a new hotel.
Even away on business, it is important to keep my teeth healthy by flossing daily!
This new hotel is very upscale and has modern furnishings.
I do not speak the native language, so I haven't been touching anything, just in case.
My times here have been fun, but it has been awfully cold.
